vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.payout (patch_0.sol#103-108) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (patch_0.sol#106)

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.loseWager (patch_0.sol#116-120) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_0.sol#117)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint private randomSeed;
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.randomSeed (patch_0.sol#34) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- play (patch_0.sol#81-97)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
PoCGame.play (patch_0.sol#81-97) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_0.sol#110-114):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_0.sol#111)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_0.sol#112)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (patch_0.sol#116-120):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) (patch_0.sol#117)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (patch_0.sol#118)

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint private randomSeed;

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.21;
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (patch_0.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in PoCGame.donateToWhale (patch_0.sol#110-114):
	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_0.sol#111

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:

	-require(bool)(whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate())))) patch_0.sol#117
